abstract: What was a 50-50 market split in 2007 for the high-definition players shifted sharply in Blu-ray’s favor in the new year.
snippet: What was a 50-50 market split in 2007 for the high-definition players shifted sharply in Blu-ray’s favor in the new year.
lead_paragraph: LOS ANGELES  One week after Warner Brothers Entertainment announced that it was abandoning its support for the next-generation HD DVD format in favor of the Blu-ray high-definition format, consumers abandoned HD DVD.

headline.main: Sales of HD DVD Players Plunge After Warner Move
headline.print_headline: Sales of HD DVD Players Plunge After Warner Move
